header.title:
Comprehensive
car selection service
header.overview:
We will help you find the perfect
car based on your criteria

autoSelection.title: Who the car selection service is for
autoSelection.subtitle: If you identify with at least one of these points, car selection will truly help you.

firstCarPurchase.title: Buying a car for the first time
firstCarPurchase.desc: You are not familiar with the technical details and are afraid of buying a problematic or damaged car.

dontWantToRiskMoney.title: Don't want to risk your money
dontWantToRiskMoney.desc: Odometer rollback and hidden accidents — we exclude such options.

valueYourTime.title: Value your time
valueYourTime.desc: No need to visit dozens of ads — we will do everything for you.

buyUsedCar.title: Buying a used car
buyUsedCar.desc: We conduct a complete technical and legal check before the purchase.

bestCarInBudget.title: The best car within your budget
bestCarInBudget.desc: We will find the best option based on price, condition, and configuration.

dontUnderstandTheMarket.title: Don't understand the market
dontUnderstandTheMarket.desc: We will advise you on the real value and help you negotiate.

locatedInAnotherCity.title: Located in another city
locatedInAnotherCity.desc: We will check the car for you and provide photo and video reports.

dontWantToDealWithResellers.title: Don't want to deal with resellers
dontWantToDealWithResellers.desc: We work only with honest sellers.

1.title: One-time car inspection
1.description: Comprehensive technical inspection of the car before purchase
includedServices: Body check with a thickness gauge
Full description of the car's condition

2.title: Car selection 'Turnkey'
2.description: We fully take care of the process of car search and inspection
includedServices: Market analysis based on your budget

4.title: Premium car selection
4.description: For those who want complete comfort and premium service.
includedServices: Personal assistance for the whole day

5.title: Expert for a day
5.description: Perfect for quick selection and evaluation of several cars in one day
includedServices: Unlimited number of car inspections within 10 hours
Full diagnostics of each car: body, engine, suspension, gearbox, electronics, test drive, computer diagnostics, VIN check + legal history
Final advice: which car is the best deal
5.suitableFor: Inspection of several cars in a day and quick decision-making

footer.title: AB AutoCheck
footer.companyInfo1: Car selection and inspection services in Poland

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: The website and services are provided by AB AutoCheck.
section1.ownership: The owner and service provider — Andrey

section2.title: 2. Collection of Personal Data
section2.item2: user registration is not carried out;
section2.item3: personal data is not collected and stored.

section3.title: 3. Communication with the Client
section3.content: Communication with clients is carried out solely at the initiative of the user through the following channels:

section4.title: 4. Use of Information
section4.content: Information received during personal communication is used only for:
section4.item3: providing car selection and inspection services.

section5.title: 5. Data Storage
section5.content: The AB AutoCheck website does not store personal data. Correspondence and information transmitted via third-party services (messengers and social networks) are stored according to the rules and policies of the respective platforms.

section6.title: 6. Transfer of Data to Third Parties
section6.content: Personal data of clients is not transferred to third parties, except in cases provided for by applicable law.

section7.title: 7. Use of Cookies and Analytics
section7.item2: analytical systems (Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.) are not applied.

section8.title: 8. User Rights
section8.content: The user has the right to:
section8.item1: request information about their personal data;
section8.item2: demand the cessation of communication and deletion of transmitted data within the used communication channels.

section9.title: 9. Changes to the Policy
section9.content: The website administration reserves the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy without prior notice. The current version is always available on the website.
